类 Date

java.lang.Object
Date
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Date class Check whether the date format is correct Check whether it is a Leap year Compare the time with the present and decide whether it is the future, past or present test case
作者:
Tianle Chen tc822, Zesheng Zhang zz354

    • getYear

      public int getYear()

    • getDay

      public int getDay()
      get the day of the date
      返回:
      day

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Check if the date is correct format January, March, May, July, August, October and December, each has 31 days April, June, September and November, each has 30 days February has 28 days in a non-leap year, and 29 days in a leap year
      返回:
      true if is correct format, false otherwise

    • isLeapYear

      public boolean isLeapYear(int year)
      determine whether a year is a leap year
      参数:
      year - a year be determined
      返回:
      true if is leap year, false otherwise

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      compare two dates Compare years, months and days
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Date>
      参数:
      date - The date to be compared
      返回:
      1 if parameter is smaller, 0 is equal, -1 is larger

    • main

      public static void main(String[] arg)
      test cases to thoroughly test the isValid() method test 6 different date
